meta_description: Black Sharpie Fine Point Permanent Marker
description: Black Sharpie Fine Point Permanent Marker
short_description: Permanent on most surfaces Fade and water resistant Quick-drying ink AP certified nontoxic formula 12 assorted colors to make your marking unique
Marker_Type - Art Colors - Metallic Silver Tip_Type - Bullet Ink_Types - Non-Washable

Bold to the max and permanent to the core, Sharpie® Permanent Markers inspire you to transform ordinary surfaces into passionately creative statements.Proudly permanent ink marks on paper, plastic, metal, and most other surfaces Intensely brilliant colors create eye-popping, vibrant impressions Remarkably resilient ink dries quickly and resists both fading and water; AP certified Endlessly versatile fine point is perfect for countless uses in the classroom, office, home, and beyond

For bold statements that need to go extra-wide, look to Sharpie Magnum Permanent Markers. These chisel markers include oversized tips for clear, precise, extra-wide marks, making them perfect for poster boards. The colored markers feature iconic Sharpie ink that is quick-drying and fade- and water-resistant, so your writing lasts for a long time. Uncap the possibilities with Sharpie.Permanent markers with oversized tips, for extra-wide marks Sturdy extra-wide felt chisel tip for clear, precise writing Permanent, ink great for use on paper, plastic, wood, and leather Quick-drying ink is fade- and water-resistant
